
      # -*- Entry points: -*-
      [console_scripts]
      mailsync_gnus_watch = rpatterson.mailsync.watch:gnus_main
      mailsync = rpatterson.mailsync.sync:main
      mailsync_offlineimap = rpatterson.mailsync.sync:offlineimap_main
